discordToken: Insert HERE the discord token of your bot
errorMessage: Thanks for using my services. Unfortunately I can't answer for the following reason :

messages.percentDifference: From *%.1f%%* to *%.1f%%* on the **%s** during *phase %d*, your squad did **%s** damage.
messages.percentDifferencePhaseChange:
From *%.1f%%* to *%.1f%%* on the **%s** during *phase %d*, if I interpret correctly, you went to next phase.
If I'm right, your squad did **%s** damage.
messages.damages: On the **%s** during  *phase %d*, *%s* damage equals to **%.1f%%**
messages.percent: On the **%s** during *phase %d*, *%s* equals to **%s** damage
messages.target:
On the **%s**, starting in *phase %d at %.1f%%* :
Your objective being *%s* damage, you need to stop in **phase %d at %.1f%%**
messages.help:
Here are the various commands I understand to evaluate your raid results :

- **%raid rancor p1 5.5%** ==> Answers with the damage done corresponding to 5.5% during phase 1 on the Rancor Heroic raid
- **%raid rancor p2 10% 4%** ==> Answers with the damage done corresponding to 6% done on phase 2 on the Rancor Heroic raid
 - ** %raid aat p3 40000 ** == > Answers with the percentage corresponding  to 40,000 damage on the Phase 3 of the Heroic AAT raid
 - ** %raid tank p4 35% 100000 ** == > Answers with the percentage to reach in order to perform 100,000 damage, starting your battle at 35 % on the Phase 4 of the Heroic AAT raid
messages.targetRange:
On the **%s**, starting in *phase %d at %.1f%%* :
Your objective being  *%s-%s* damage, you need to stop between
 **phase %d at %.1f%%** 
 and 
 **phase %d at %.1f%%**

errorMessages.overRaidEndSecond: There's not enough Health Points reamining for your second objective
errorMessages.incoherentParams: The last two parameters are not compatible
errorMessages.incorrectNumber: I did not recognize a number
errorMessages.incorrectParamsNumber: The number of parameters doesn't match any command

setUpCommandParameters.help:
This command allows you to setup the bot.
Possible commands :
%setup guildNumber XXX
You can find your guild number on swgoh.gg in the address of your guild page

You must be part of the «botAdmins» Discord group to administrate the bot.

swgoh.gg refused to send us data about your guild.

Please try again in a few minutes.

messages.introMessage:
Detailed help can be found here : <https://jedistar.jimdo.com/jedistar-bot/>
Here is a little overview of what i can do for you :
messages.smallModsMessage: - %help mods : to know more about mods command
messages.smallRaidMessage: - %help raid : to know more about raid command
messages.smallArenaMessage: - %help arena : to know more about arena command
messages.smallTbMessage: - %help tb : to know more about tb command
messages.smallPayoutsMessage: - %help payouts : to know more about payouts command
messages.modsMessage:
**This command returns the mod setup advised for a given character.**

**Example**
%mods anakin
messages.raidMessage:
**Here are the various commands I understand to evaluate your raid results** :

- **%raid rancor p1 5.5%** ==> Answers with the damage done corresponding to 5.5% during phase 1 on the Rancor Heroic raid
- **%raid rancor p2 10% 4%** ==> Answers with the damage done corresponding to 6% done on phase 2 on the Rancor Heroic raid
 - ** %raid aat p3 40000 ** == > Answers with the percentage corresponding  to 40,000 damage on the Phase 3 of the Heroic AAT raid
 - ** %raid tank p4 35% 100000 ** == > Answers with the percentage to reach in order to perform 100,000 damage, starting your battle at 35 % on the Phase 4 of the Heroic AAT raid
messages.arenaMessage:
**This command returns the highest arena rank reachable with 5 fights.**

**Example**
%arena 26
messages.tbMessage:
**Possible commands** :
%tb platoon chars aayla 5\*
%tb platoon ships ghost 5\*
%tb gp
messages.payoutsMessage:
This command allows you to manage your arena payouts.
**Examples :** %payouts
**Administration commands :**
%payouts add user 15:00 UTC flag_us https://swgoh.gg/u/user
%payouts add user 12:00 EST
%payouts delete user

errorMessages.paramsError:
The command you asked is unknown, thanks to use one of those : 

 - %help : to have an overview 
 - %help mods : to know more about mods command 
 - %help raid : to know more about raid command
errorMessages.technicalError: An error occured, please contact you Discord's Administrator

balancingCommandParameters.help:
Cette commande vous permet de connaître votre équilibrage sur un raid.

**Exemple d'appel**
%equilibrage rancor
**Commandes pour les officiers :**
%equilibrage maj
%equilibrage lancer rancor @podium1 @podium2 @podium3 @exclus1 @exclus2
%equilibrage ajouter @user
%equilibrage supprimer @user
%equlibrage supprimer XXXX
%equilibrage terminer tank
%equilibrage lancer tank podium-auto @exclusDuTop10
%equilibrage lancer tank @podium1 @podium2 @podium3 @exclusDuTop10
%equilibrage ajuster @user tank podium +1
%equilibrage ajuster @user tank 2 -1

payoutCommandParameters.help:
This command allows you to manage your arena payouts.
**Examples :** %payouts
**Administration commands :**
%payouts add user 15:00 UTC flag_us https://swgoh.gg/u/user
%payouts add user 12:00 EST
%payouts delete user
